mapper.select: SELECT wm.id_membre, wm.id_statut, wm.pseudo_membre, area.id_groupe_p AS area_id, area.id_univers AS area_universe_id, area.user_role AS area_role, universe.id_univers AS universe_id, universe.user_role AS universe_role FROM woonoz_membre wm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT wgpm.id_membre, wgpm.id_groupe_p, wgpm.user_role, wgp.id_univers FROM woonoz_groupe_p_membre wgpm JOIN woonoz_groupe_p wgp ON wgp.id_groupe_p = wgpm.id_groupe_p) area ON area.id_membre = wm.id_membre LEFT JOIN ( SELECT um.id_membre, um.user_role, um.id_univers FROM universe_membre umv) universe ON universe.id_membre = wm.id_membre WHERE user_id = #{userId.id}
